About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands


With more than 10 years of successful testing and 3 years of front-end development experience I will bring the success to your business.
I have very strong R&D experience and ability to adopt new technologies for team improvement.
I also have exceptional work ethic, positive attitude and excellent collaboration skills.
With clear understanding of both front-end and databse, I will make your project successful.

Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3
